A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I didn't like the way Luke Skywalker was envisioned by this director. His character was never like that. I can see why Mark Hamill had his doubts about the direction this film was going. Overall\, the film was ok\, just not great. When you've seen the original films when they first came out\, it's alot to live up to. Hopefully the next film will be better.
